price: 5. Umma(2) moko te ekoki kopuşa liboso to kozongisa mokano na bango sima.
arabic: مَّا تَسۡبِقُ مِنۡ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلَهَا وَمَا يَسۡتَـٔۡخِرُونَ
footnotes: 2 Umma: Lisanga ya bato, bótala Al-Baqarah: 128.

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: mā tasbiqu min ummatin ajalahā wamā yastakhirūna
